GitHub Action 에서 특정 Label 이 붙은 PR 건너뛰기

단일 Label:

name: Some Action for single label

on:
	pull_request:
		types: [opened]

jobs:
	someAction:
		if: $
	runs-on: ubuntu-latest
	// 생략...

다중 Label:

name: Some Action for multiple labels

on:
	pull_request:
		types: [opened]

jobs:
	someAction:
		if: >-
			$
runs-on: ubuntu-latest
	// 생략...

참고 자료

  • https://stackoverflow.com/a/74829754
